cab.content: SECRETDIRECTORATE OF INTELLIGENCEScotland House, S.W.1. 16th October, 1920.SUPPLEMENTARY WEEKLY REPORTThe Railway Executive has deoided that the situation warrants tho calling of a special delegate meeting for Wednesday next at 10 a.m, Mr. Cramp has been instructed to circularise all the branches, pointing out the serious position that would arise should the miners be defeated and that they must bear this in mind when coming to their decision to be prepared to act upon any instructions that might arise as the result of next Wednesdays meeting. No steps have boon taken at present to oall together the full Executive of the Triple Alliance.
